| First Header  | Second Header |

| Content Cell  | Content Cell  |

| Item      | Value |
| :-------- | -----:|
| Computer  | $1600 |
| Phone     |   $12 |
| Pipe      |    $1 |

| Function name | Description                    |
| ------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `help()`      | Display the help window.       |
| `destroy()`   | **Destroy your computer!**     |

|foo|bar|baz|
|:--|:-:|--:|
|   | Q |   |
|W  |   |  W|
